MANAGER, EMBEDDED DEVELOPMENT

Brief Job Description:
?Evaluates technical project requirements, identifies and reduces technical risks
?Designs complex high-level software architecture, including architectures that require large hardware integration. Ensures that the design and architecture meet the product goals
?Creates and reviews detail project plans, design, test and integration documents
?Ensures that the quality product is delivered on time, with required features, meeting company and industrial standards and company objectives
?Participate in creation of and improvement of company processes and technical practices
?Manages other members of the engineering team including other departments
?Manages project out-sourced to third party contractors

Technical Skills Required:
Experience with the following is considered a must:
?C/C++ programming proficiency
?Object oriented programming
?Following coding standards / development procedures
?Proficiency with real time kernels (like VxWorks, Nucleus, QNX, uC/OS, ...)
?Proficiency with real time programming (threads, synchronization objects, ...)
?Proficiency in UNIX (Linux / Sun) and Windows NT programming
?Proficiency in VxWorks and Linux kernel programming
?Proficiency with TCP/IP networks and programming
?Proficiency with SSL programming
?Implemented a communication protocols
?Implemented a device drivers
?Experience with newer processors/microcontrollers (like ARM, Motorola, Intel, Dallas, ... )
?Experience with Zinc windowing environment on VxWorks/MS Windows
?Work experience with assembler programming
?Ported Linux on embedded platforms

The following are considered definite assets:
?Work experience with smart card software
?Work experience on POS devices
?Work experience writing POS applications
?Knowledge of digital hardware
?Knowledge of wireless data networks
?Knowledge of MFC

Hardware/Software environment:
?Nucleus RTOS, VxWorks RTOS and Linux
?ARM V2.5 C/C++ IDE, Tornado 2.1 IDE, Linux
?Hardware based on 32 bit ARM7 RISC CPU and Intel

Other Skills Required:
?Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal
?Proven leadership skills
?Ability to manage others and work independently
?Excellent Time Management skills are a must in this role in addition to the need to multi-task
?Some travel may be required

Education: BSc.

Location: Toronto

Level: Senior

Email: careers@mistwireless.com

NO AGENCIES PLEASE

Please note in the subject line of your email the title of the position you are applying to...thanks!
